page.title: 14EASTRIGGS PETS
page.content: 635 questionnaires distributed, 1 to each Eastriggs house, 130 returned, about 1 in 5. Village totals may be estimated by multyping sample totals by 5. PETS RECORDED: DOGS 9 houses have 1 dog each; 4 houses have 2; 4 have 3; 5 have 4; and 3 have 5 dogs; sample total 64 dogs. CATS 9 houses have 1 cat each; 3 houses have 2; 2 have 3; 2 have 4; and 1 house has 5; sample total 34 cats. CAGE BIRDS Sample total of house pet birds: 9. Also 3 fanciers have 12, 34 and 80. PIGEONS 3 fanciers have 30,34 and 40. FISH Sample total 90. OTHER SAMPLE TOTALS: 4 hamsters; 8 guinea pigs; 6 gerbils; 1 tortoise; 14 rabbits; 8 horses; 1 ferret. Also, 1 person has 19 hives of bees and 1 person has 16 hens and a cock.
